text:
good morning community, is there a way to save more than one value in a form field?
I am using the HubSpot api to send and yet in a field I need to save more than one option or at least save the user more than once but with a different field.

Hi Anyone know how to hide this error message? I have embed the form in an external website...
the error message look like duplicate when using one or two fields
You can style it with CSS to either hide it (ok option) or to look more separate from the other error (better option)
Thanks Andrey, but since its showing as an iframe in the external web page style is not accessible...
What is the status of this request? I am trying to list my tags in alphabetical order in the dropdown and unable to?
